title: Can you please fix this thing :D
body: Hi ! So i keep getting ms problems on euw account. On eune sometimes too but minor. From 40 i usually play with it goes to 80 and feels like 200 :D even freezes for some moments but still showing 80 . Its kinda annoying knowing that i got demoted from d1 right before the season will end because of this funny little problem. Happens like everygame. It goes up and down. Im pretty sure its not my internet conection and ive already reinstalled the game.

replies.body:
Issues with latency (ms) are usually caused by poor ISP routing to the server. Before we look into your route we first need to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with League, so working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be a good next step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your latency.
